data.title: Audi Q4 Guide - Features, Price, Models, Luxury, Technology & Lots More
data.meta_description: Thinking about buying a new Audi Q4? This comprehensive guide covers everything you need to know, from the different models, price, features & more.
data.text:
Are you seeking a premium compact SUV combining style, performance, and cutting-edge technology?

Then look no further than the Audi Q4 e-tron. This high-performance, luxury family SUV is designed to offer you a thrilling driving experience while providing you with all the luxury and comfort you expect from Audi.

As a result of this buyer's guide, we'll explore the key features and considerations you need to know and keep in mind when choosing your next Audi Q4.

This SUV is available in three trims - 40, 45 e-tron Quattro, and 55 e-tron Quattro.

The 40 trim is equipped with a single rear-mounted motor and a 77.0-kWh battery pack. On the other hand, the 45 e-tron Quattro and 55 e-tron Quattro trims feature dual motors - one for each axle - along with the same 77.0-kWh battery pack.

The Q4 e-tron also comes with a comprehensive range of standard features, including a 10.1-inch touchscreen infotainment system, a 12.3-inch digital instrument cluster, and an array of driver-assistance technologies. Additionally, optional features are available, such as a head-up display, a panoramic sunroof, and a premium sound system, to name only a few.

In the eyes of the automotive experts, the Audi Q4 e-tron has garnered positive reviews. For example, Car and Driver recommended its spacious interior, comfortable ride, and impressive range.

At the same time, Motor Trend described it as "A well-rounded electric SUV that's both enjoyable to drive and practical for everyday use."

For those seeking a luxurious, all-electric SUV with an extensive range and a comfortable driving experience, the Audi Q4 e-tron stands as a compelling choice for you.

Design

When it comes to the Q4's design, the progressive design of the Q4 e-tron is not just about aesthetics; it's also focused on enhancing its functionality as well as optimising its aerodynamics - to maximise both range and performance for you.

Other noteworthy areas of its design include:

Striking Design

The Audi Q4 boasts a bold and modern exterior design with the signature Audi Singleframe grille and distinctive LED headlights, making it a pure head-turner for those who see it on the road.

Available in both SUV and Sportback body styles, you also have a choice of type to suit your individual needs.

High-Quality Interior

When you step inside, you will find a luxurious cabin with premium materials, spacious seating, and advanced technology.

For instance, Audi's Virtual Cockpit and MMI touchscreen infotainment system provide you with an immersive driving experience with a significant display screen presence.

Prominent Attributes

The Audi Q4 e-tron gives you a robust presence with its wide stance and substantial wheels - unmistakably signalling its SUV capabilities. Additionally to its presence, the prominent enclosed single-frame grille also proudly represents its identity as a complete electric Audi.

Wheel Selection

The Audi Q4 e-tron offers a range of appealing wheel options. The Sport trim includes attractive 19" alloy wheels as standard. Opt for the S line, and you'll enjoy 20" alloy wheels, while the Black Edition enhances the look with impressive 21" Audi Sport alloys.

Smart Lighting

When it comes to the Q4 e-tron's headlights, these are intelligently designed with LEDs as standard and combined with the Audi's signature beam to illuminate the wing mirrors.

Suppose you go even further and opt for the Technology Pack. In that case, you'll elevate your lighting experience with Matrix LED headlights featuring dynamic indicators and the choice of four digital light signatures as well.

Aesthetic Silhouettes

The Q4 e-tron's design prioritises sleek and elegant lines, creating a visually appealing silhouette. The clean and modern design elements contribute to your car's overall aesthetics, making it a head-turner on the road.

Design functionality

Beyond its stylish appearance, the Q4 e-tron is designed with practicality in mind. Its compact SUV body style offers you a balance between interior space and exterior dimensions. Both of these factors make it versatile for urban commuting and your weekend getaways with ease.

Aerodynamics

Efficient aerodynamics are a key feature of the Q4 e-tron's design. The car's shape is optimised to minimise air resistance - reducing drag on the car while driving and increasing efficiency, thus helping to contribute to a longer range.

This focus on aerodynamics not only enhances the SUV's performance but also extends its electric range - allowing you to go further on a single charge.

Quattro All-Wheel Drive

The Audi Q4 e-tron features the Quattro All-Wheel Drive system, providing enhanced traction and stability across various road conditions.

Consequently, this system helps you distribute power between the front and rear wheels as needed - helping to optimise your grip and handling when you need it the most.

Quattro All-Wheel Drive also contributes to the SUV's overall performance, ensuring you get confident and secure driving experiences in the diverse of environments. Consequently, it is a practical and reliable feature that enhances the Q4 e-tron's versatility.

Price

Due to prices and offers changing over time, please see our dedicated product pages for the Audi Q4 Compact SUV and Audi Q4 Sportback, for the most up to date pricing offers available.

Audi Q4 Final Thoughts

When it comes to the Audi Q4, it is a compelling choice for those seeking a blend of style, performance, and luxury in a compact SUV.

With its striking design, advanced technology, and exceptional driving dynamics, the Audi Q4 is sure to make a statement on the road. As a result, take your time to explore the options, consider your needs, and don't hesitate to visit our Audi dealerships for a test drive and expert guidance in choosing the perfect Audi Q4 for you.
